title: Is the Dua after Wudu Authentic & what is its Reward?
transcript: my question is um uh to my knowledge there's like a dua after um what's it called after will i don't know how it goes but is it like that is this authentic and like uh i've heard of a reward saying like if you say this after every single that that's your ability um like you'll unlock the eighth gate of heaven and you get to pick uh which heaven that you want is this authentic or not would you admitted from any of it he wishes uh to my recollection this is an authentic hadith narrated by muslim in the sahir
